text: Magnolia georgii is a species of flowering plant in the family Magnoliaceae. It is endemic to Colombia. It is known commonly as cucharo.Calderon, E. 1998. Magnolia georgii. The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species 1998. Downloaded on 08 October 2015. ==References== georgii Category:Endemic flora of Colombia Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
